title: Rockstar3
author: Rockstar3
content: Hello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I don't see any information about Bitcoin, but you're just telling about your prediction if Bitcoin will cross $30K very soon.For me you're just same like other members who throwing random numbers and make people believe about their useless prediction. We may see Bitcoin will cross $30K, but I doubt we will see that very soon since I don't see the movement of the market will bullish enough. Reaching $27K is still hard since around 3 months the price just stick around $20K.

comments.author: Rockstar3
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on August 17, 2022, 01:56:35 PMI don't see any information about Bitcoin, but you're just telling about your prediction if Bitcoin will cross $30K very soon.For me you're just same like other members who throwing random numbers and make people believe about their useless prediction. We may see Bitcoin will cross $30K, but I doubt we will see that very soon since I don't see the movement of the market will bullish enough. Reaching $27K is still hard since around 3 months the price just stick around $20K.I agree with you.  But according to many big traders, the market is likely to go higher soon.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMIn fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly.The current state of Bitcoin is that since June 2022, the market value has been steadily rising; from lows of $18k to over $24kQuote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PM<snip>I understood little of the remaining part of your post. But, DYOR, and do not blindly follow the advice or speculations of so-called 'experts' or 'big traders'.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 02:28:59 PMQuote from: Apocollapse on August 17, 2022, 01:56:35 PMI don't see any information about Bitcoin, but you're just telling about your prediction if Bitcoin will cross $30K very soon.For me you're just same like other members who throwing random numbers and make people believe about their useless prediction. We may see Bitcoin will cross $30K, but I doubt we will see that very soon since I don't see the movement of the market will bullish enough. Reaching $27K is still hard since around 3 months the price just stick around $20K.I agree with you.  But according to many big traders, the market is likely to go higher soon.Whether they are experts or big traders, they can only make predictions and nothing is certain here. A wise investment should only be made when we conduct our own research and do not listen to the advice of anyone else. I am convinced that bitcoin is going to hit $30k and may even reach a new ATH at some point in the future. We cannot pinpoint a specific time for when this will happen, but it will eventually happen.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.It's the information that everyone knows though, after we have the bull run in November 2021, reaching a new all time high, sooner or later a bearish cycle will show up. And that's what happen in 2022, getting lower lows of $17,500. The best time to buy bitcoin is yesterday, and the second best time? is today. And you will have to look at the long term to really make profit in bitcoin. A good 2-3 years of investment and buying in the dip will be a good strategy. So we will see if $30k, can be achieved and unlocked at the end of the year, it's not a numbers though, if we didn't hit it, nothing to worry.

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.Very simple discussion. But it's still very realistic for Bitcoin if it's to hit $30,000 in this year even though I've only seen $25K hit in the last month as well as this month, but for the end of this year or next month it's definitely very possible for Bitcoin to continue to grow and stay in price. $30,000. So there will be no regrets and mistakes if everyone wants to buy more Bitcoin at this time and make profit with it when the price has increased in the market.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 02:28:59 PMQuote from: Apocollapse on August 17, 2022, 01:56:35 PMI don't see any information about Bitcoin, but you're just telling about your prediction if Bitcoin will cross $30K very soon.For me you're just same like other members who throwing random numbers and make people believe about their useless prediction. We may see Bitcoin will cross $30K, but I doubt we will see that very soon since I don't see the movement of the market will bullish enough. Reaching $27K is still hard since around 3 months the price just stick around $20K.I agree with you.  But according to many big traders, the market is likely to go higher soon.You don't have to trust big traders because it's just speculation.You have to find a reason why the price may rise again later in the long term so that it will make you buy bitcoin while the price is still cheap.If you want to invest in bitcoin, now is a good time to buy because the price isn't that high and if the price is going down, maybe it's because bitcoin is also suffering from what's happening in the world right now.But in the future, bitcoin has a chance to go higher than now and will exceed $30k.So you better find out why you should invest in bitcoin right now.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.I don't know who's expert you are referring to, but it's just better to threat those as nothing like an ordinary member here, just making educated guesses.$30000 or even higher will be a big boost for us since the market is in the bearish trend this year. And hopefully even a $20000 at the end of the year is already a big reassurance that maybe next year is very different.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.Lmao all have this information. All know the capabilities and capacity of Bitcoins. Leave the industry experts, any person who is investing in Bitcoins from a year can tell that the bear market will end soon and Bitcoins will grow.Nevertheless OP , thanks again for sharing this. Bitcoins are expected to reach 100k usd by the end of this year.So if anyone hasn’t bought any Bitcoins, then buy it ASAP in these cheap price.Thank Op later for his value-able information he shared here.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on August 18, 2022, 12:22:46 PMQuote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.Lmao all have this information. All know the capabilities and capacity of Bitcoins. Leave the industry experts, any person who is investing in Bitcoins from a year can tell that the bear market will end soon and Bitcoins will grow.Nevertheless OP , thanks again for sharing this. Bitcoins are expected to reach 100k usd by the end of this year.So if anyone hasn’t bought any Bitcoins, then buy it ASAP in these cheap price.Thank Op later for his value-able information he shared here.I think some of us who have the experienced already, or at least been enough in the market to experience the bears and bullish cycle knows that sooner or later the barrier that is 6 digit will be broken.And for the industry experts, they all have their narratives for predicting the price be it $100k or even as high as $500k in 2024-2025. But we need a lot of patience and wait for the natural flow of the market in the next bull run.

comments.author: Pesona1
comments.body: Quote from: Davian144 on August 18, 2022, 07:15:59 AMQuote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.Very simple discussion. But it's still very realistic for Bitcoin if it's to hit $30,000 in this year even though I've only seen $25K hit in the last month as well as this month, but for the end of this year or next month it's definitely very possible for Bitcoin to continue to grow and stay in price. $30,000. So there will be no regrets and mistakes if everyone wants to buy more Bitcoin at this time and make profit with it when the price has increased in the market.The price of bitcoin is now back weakening after previously being above the price of $ 25,000, according to some analysts say if bitcoin is able to hold at the price of $ 25,000 it is possible to rise to the price of $ 28,000 or $ 30,000 , but it seems bitcoin has not been able to break the price resistance above $ 25,000 and make it back bouncing down at this time, but still we can't use other people analysis as a guide in investing at this time.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: Davian144 on August 18, 2022, 07:15:59 AMQuote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PMHello friends, today I will discuss Bitcoin. In fact, the current state of Bitcoin is that since December 2021, the market value of Bitcoin has dropped significantly. Now that Bitcoin's state of market power experts think Bitcoin is going to show its own respect very soon. Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.Very simple discussion. But it's still very realistic for Bitcoin if it's to hit $30,000 in this year even though I've only seen $25K hit in the last month as well as this month, but for the end of this year or next month it's definitely very possible for Bitcoin to continue to grow and stay in price. $30,000. So there will be no regrets and mistakes if everyone wants to buy more Bitcoin at this time and make profit with it when the price has increased in the market.And if it can't grow and hold at $30k this year, we have nothing to worry about. If bitcoin doesn't hit $30k this year, then next year it will definitely hit $30k. It's just that sooner or later, it's bound to happen.It's all guesswork and we won't know if bitcoin will go up or down, but at this point if we don't buy bitcoin it will be a mistake because in the long run bitcoin price will always go higher every year.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: In cryptocurrency, people will always come up with different predictions but the chance of Bitcoin reaching the $30,000 price is slim and if it does happen then we should expect a new bottom price which will be below $17,708.62.I don't expect this to happen now until Q4 but let's wait and see the market's future trend since the institution is the major investor in this current market.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstar3 on August 17, 2022, 01:20:09 PM(....)Many people are asking why I bought this coin as the price is slowly decreasing. Yes it is normal because it is estimated that bitcoin price may cross 30000$ this year. And another advance I can say that those who want to trade should buy bitcoin now if they can, they will see big profit very soon.I'm glad that there are like you that are not expecting the price of Bitcoin will go in just a short period of time, especially before this year will end.Avoid listening to those people who got have negative thoughts at all, you bought it because you analyze it and you are believing in it, it's your own opinion.Your price target for this year is almost the same with me, it's on between $20,000 - $30,000.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: The bitcoin market has always been hard to predict, these days we have the economy of most countries with big GDP being very unpredictable too which affects the global economy and bitcoin price indirectly. In a couple of days there are certain things that could make the world could go in two different directions: oil price starting to come down to below $50 or shooting up above $120 and continuing to go higher. Each direction has a significant effect on US+EU economy which in turn could cause panic selling/buying in bitcoin.I'll wait a little before making predictions though.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: suzanne5223 on August 18, 2022, 07:03:57 PMIn cryptocurrency, people will always come up with different predictions but the chance of Bitcoin reaching the $30,000 price is slim and if it does happen then we should expect a new bottom price which will be below $17,708.62.I don't expect this to happen now until Q4 but let's wait and see the market's future trend since the institution is the major investor in this current market.With the current correction, I can say that it's really hard to achieve $30k before the year end because the resistance is very strong and there's still no big news to pump Bitcoin enough to break the resistance, we just need to be more patient for now and focus on our own strategy. What ever your prediction with Bitcoin is, you need to focus on that and don't listen to any noise in the market, Bitcoin may fall but eventually it will rise again, it's just a matter of time before we see it pumping again.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Cool that you think and do the way you do, less cool you're confident anyone buying now will see "big profit very soon". We're barely a year out from ATH, and next ATHs don't tend to come along so soon after the previous. I know, I know, past history nothing to do with future performance, but given the present conditions all around the world, would take something beyond optimism to expect "big profit very soon".It... isn't that simple.What is simple? Bitcoin a good buy for the long term.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I do not think that people should be coming here and talking about bitcoin like it's anything simple. Bitcoin market, and in general crypto markets are not simple and it’s not easy to understand what’s going to happen. Many people think that way and they are usually wrong.The only thing we could be certain about bitcoin is that it is volatile and that means tomorrow you can wake up to bitcoin being 20k as much as you can wake up to it being 30k, they are equally possible. This is why never bet your money on short term, because you never know. Long term is easier because inflation and devaluation of dollar means that anything pegged against it will go up, this includes bitcoin, cryptos, gold, stocks and oil, all works well.

comments.author: jostorres
comments.body: Quote from: suzanne5223 on August 18, 2022, 07:03:57 PMIn cryptocurrency, people will always come up with different predictions but the chance of Bitcoin reaching the $30,000 price is slim and if it does happen then we should expect a new bottom price which will be below $17,708.62.I don't expect this to happen now until Q4 but let's wait and see the market's future trend since the institution is the major investor in this current market.30k slim? But why when as of now bitcoin is preparing to break the anticipated 25k and when that happens the rest of the price are now going to be easier to achieve. I believe that btc can reach more than 30k before we end this year but I won't say for now if it will bypass the old ATH.You shouldn't say that when the price rise a new bottom will be unlocked but the more the chance it will happen only if the price is declining. Currently, we are still in the quarter 3 of the year so maybe there are still declines that will happen but by the time we hit the fourth and final quarter. I expect that declines are now going to be rare. That is for sure.
